title: Secret whisperer

Secret whisperer

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

Secret whisperers are a type of monster added in dNetHack. They are associated with the Madman role. They increase in power by 1 level per point of insight the Madman has.

A secret-whisperer:

  • can fly.
  • can flow under doors.
  • can survive underwater.
  • does not breathe.
  • has no eyes.
  • has no hands.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • does not have a solid form.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is neither male nor female.
  • cannot be tamed.
